actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 42, United States Code, chapter 7, subchapter II to reduce from ten to five years the length of time a divorced woman's marriage to an insured individual must have lasted in order for her to qualify for wife's  or widow's benefits on his wage record.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to decrease to five the number of years a divorced woman must have been married to an insured individual in order for her to qualify for wife's or widow's benefits on his wage record.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 42, United States Code, chapter 7, subchapter II to reduce from ten to five years the length of time a divorced woman's marriage to an insured individual must have lasted in order for her to qualify for wife's  or widow's benefits on his wage record.
